ABOUT_ME_DESCRIPTION: I'm Meik, a frontend developer and quality manager. For me, coding is much more than just a profession – it's a true passion.
ABOUT_ME_LOCATION: Based near Kassel, I prefer working remotely. Modern, flexible work models align perfectly with my commitment to efficiency and work-life balance.
ABOUT_ME_PASSION: Curiosity and a love of learning are not just duties for me – they’re part of who I am. I thrive on exploring new technologies and venturing into uncharted territory.
ABOUT_ME_PROFESSION: I approach challenges with an analytical, structured, and creative mindset. Drawing on years of leadership experience and persistence, I find solutions to (almost) any problem – even if it means taking unconventional paths.
